tha-ap183:0.3_0: Hermits over the seniors, flowers, and goes with seniors.
tha-ap183:1.4_0: while walking along I glanced at her.
tha-ap183:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap183:4.1_0: These seven eons of the eon
tha-ap183:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap183:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap183:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap183:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakuṭi.
